Own Choice from a Specified List
Castle Grounds, Berkhamsted Choice of test piece: "Gems of Tschaikovsky" or "HMS Pinafore" Prizes: £7, £4, £2 March contest: 1. Irthlingborough, 2. Chesham, 3. Rushden. 6 bands competed
